name: ADOBE__LIST_LIBRARIES
description: Retrieve all Creative Cloud Libraries for managing shared design assets and brand elements.

limit.description: Maximum number of libraries to return

name: ADOBE__CREATE_LIBRARY
description: Create a new Creative Cloud Library for organizing design assets and team collaboration.

name: ADOBE__GET_LIBRARY
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific Creative Cloud Library including assets and metadata.

library_id.description: ID of the library to retrieve

name: ADOBE__UPDATE_LIBRARY
description: Update library information including name, description, and collaboration settings.

library_id.description: ID of the library to update

name: ADOBE__DELETE_LIBRARY
description: Delete a Creative Cloud Library permanently including all contained assets.

library_id.description: ID of the library to delete

name: ADOBE__LIST_LIBRARY_ASSETS
description: Retrieve all assets in a Creative Cloud Library including colors, graphics, and text styles.

library_id.description: ID of the library to get assets from

limit.description: Maximum number of assets to return

name: ADOBE__CREATE_LIBRARY_ASSET
description: Add a new asset to a Creative Cloud Library such as colors, graphics, or character styles.

library_id.description: ID of the library to add asset to

name: ADOBE__GET_LIBRARY_ASSET
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific asset in a Creative Cloud Library.

element_id.description: ID of the asset to retrieve

name: ADOBE__UPDATE_LIBRARY_ASSET
description: Update an existing asset in a Creative Cloud Library with new data or metadata.

element_id.description: ID of the asset to update

name: ADOBE__DELETE_LIBRARY_ASSET
description: Delete an asset from a Creative Cloud Library to manage storage and organization.

element_id.description: ID of the asset to delete

name: ADOBE__UPLOAD_ASSET
description: Upload a creative file or asset to Creative Cloud for storage and collaboration.

createRevision.description: Whether to create a new revision

name: ADOBE__LIST_ASSETS
description: Retrieve all Creative Cloud assets with filtering and search capabilities for asset management.

path.description: Folder path to list assets from

limit.description: Maximum number of assets to return

name: ADOBE__GET_ASSET
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific Creative Cloud asset including metadata and download links.

asset_id.description: ID of the asset to retrieve

name: ADOBE__UPDATE_ASSET
description: Update asset metadata including name, description, and tags for better organization.

asset_id.description: ID of the asset to update

name: ADOBE__DELETE_ASSET
description: Delete a Creative Cloud asset permanently from storage and libraries.

asset_id.description: ID of the asset to delete

name: ADOBE__CREATE_PHOTOSHOP_JOB
description: Create automated Photoshop processing jobs for image editing, format conversion, and batch operations.

href.description: URL or path to input file

name: ADOBE__GET_PHOTOSHOP_JOB_STATUS
description: Check the status and progress of an automated Photoshop processing job.

job_id.description: ID of the Photoshop job to check

name: ADOBE__CREATE_LIGHTROOM_EDIT
description: Apply automated photo editing presets and adjustments using Lightroom processing.

name: ADOBE__CREATE_PDF_OPERATION
description: Perform PDF operations like merging, splitting, converting, and OCR using Adobe PDF Services.

assetID.description: ID of the PDF asset to operate on

operation.description: Type of PDF operation to perform

name: ADOBE__GET_PDF_JOB_STATUS
description: Check the status and progress of PDF processing operations for document workflows.

job_id.description: ID of the PDF job to check

name: ADOBE__LIST_FONTS
description: Retrieve available Adobe Fonts for typography and design consistency across projects.

limit.description: Maximum number of fonts to return

name: ADOBE__GET_USER_PROFILE
description: Retrieve authenticated user's Adobe profile information and Creative Cloud subscription details.

name: ADOBE__LIST_SHARED_ASSETS
description: Retrieve assets shared with the user through Creative Cloud collaboration features.

query.description: Query parameters for filtering shared assets

limit.description: Maximum number of shared assets to return

name: ADOBE__CREATE_SHARE_LINK
description: Create shareable links for Creative Cloud assets to enable external collaboration and review.

asset_id.description: ID of the asset to share

expiration.description: Expiration date for share link (ISO 8601 format)

name: ADOBE__GET_ASSET_COMMENTS
description: Retrieve comments and feedback on Creative Cloud assets for collaboration and review workflows.

asset_id.description: ID of the asset to get comments for

name: ADOBE__CREATE_ASSET_COMMENT
description: Add comments and feedback to Creative Cloud assets for collaborative review processes.

asset_id.description: ID of the asset to comment on

annotation.description: Visual annotation data for specific location on asset

name: ADOBE__GET_CREATIVE_CLOUD_USAGE
description: Retrieve Creative Cloud storage usage and subscription analytics for account management.
